amendment.description: Manager's amendment makes technical and conforming changes to the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 111-317 to make technical and conforming changes to the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Velazquez amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Velazquez amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Ms. Velazquez.
